title: ponnambalam tannil
sahitya:
ponnambalam tannil kaNDEn (nAn) naTana mannan mukkaNNan umai kaNDa vaikaNThanai


anupallavi

  eNNangaLai tANDi ninrADum nAyakanai puN sumanda mEniyanai bhuviyengum niraindavanai


caraNam    dAnavar talaivanai mOna mudalvanai hInarai kappavanai digambaranai haranai
minkoDi parandiDum pANDiyan nATTanai ANDavanai anbu pUNDavanai shivanai
